resources.string:
1.Battery Charging: Notifies when the devicestarts or stops charging.

2.Screen Status: Informs about the screenturning on or off.

3.Bluetooth Status: Alerts when Bluetooth isturned on/off or connected/disconnected.

4.Wi-Fi Status: Tracks when Wi-Fi isconnected, disconnected, or toggled.

5.Airplane Mode: Indicates when airplanemode is enabled or disabled.

6.Mobile Internet Status: Alerts when mobiledata is turned on or off.

7.Language: You will hear your phones language change.
